summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements (REQ-70 through REQ-81), including the AdminPanel with passcode gate, backend gallery API, React Query hooks, tabbed admin interface, change passcode feature, routing, header admin link, dynamic GallerySection, scroll animations, hover animations, and hero entrance animations. However, several specific requirements have gaps or are only partially implemented based on the available evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin Panel route (#/admin) must render AdminPanel with site Header and Footer wrapped around it
missing_requirements.reason: In App.tsx, the #/admin route renders only AdminPanel and Toaster â€” Header and Footer are NOT included, contrary to REQ-75 which specifies 'with the site Header and Footer'.

missing_requirements.requirement: GallerySection must use useGetGalleryImagesByEvent hook to fetch images per event
missing_requirements.reason: GallerySection.tsx only imports and uses useGetGalleryEvents. It renders event.images directly from the event object. The useGetGalleryImagesByEvent hook is not used in GallerySection, so images are not separately fetched per event as specified in REQ-77.

missing_requirements.requirement: Villages tab bulk Excel/CSV file upload via SheetJS with sequential async processing
missing_requirements.reason: AdminPanel.tsx is truncated and the visible portion does not confirm SheetJS is imported or used for Excel/CSV bulk import. The requirement explicitly calls for SheetJS library usage.

missing_requirements.requirement: Villages tab export to Excel producing villages-export.xlsx
missing_requirements.reason: AdminPanel.tsx is truncated. No evidence of Excel export implementation using SheetJS XLSX write is visible in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Villages tab export to PDF producing villages-export.pdf via jsPDF
missing_requirements.reason: AdminPanel.tsx is truncated. No evidence of jsPDF import or PDF export implementation is visible in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Scroll-triggered fade-in animations must be added to Footer component
missing_requirements.reason: Footer.tsx is not listed in the modified files as having scroll animation added. REQ-78 lists Footer as one of the sections requiring scroll-triggered animation.

hallucinated_features.description: A separate migration.mo file was added as a data migration module
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify creating a separate migration.mo file. The constraints state all backend logic must remain in the single main actor file (backend/main.mo). Adding a separate migration module was not requested.
